suite.name: if a class have difference in constant the tests cover that class must be selected
find new methods and their test
a method that is different only for a different name of a variable must not be marked as different
check that a method that have changed signature is considerate as new method

test.name: the test that cover a method that call a method with changed signature must be selected
method with changed signature ia not a new method
method that call a method with changed signature is a modified method

suite.name: check if the all graph is analyzed
If a test method is override by a one or more class, that test must be analyzed but not also superclass's version of that method
